title: Collaborative Problem-Solving Enhancement Program through PISA-Type Mathematics Task Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistical concepts, probability calculation methods, and basic data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Developing PISA-type tasks utilizing real-life contexts (Asian Games case studies) and emphasizing collaborative learning environments. Analyzing task effectiveness through summative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can independently design PISA-type math tasks using real-life data.
Learners enhance their ability to solve uncertainty and data analysis problems through collaborative learning.
Learners meet over 80% of the criteria for evaluating the validity and practicality of developed tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
